data.name: I'm Strongest Legend
data.detailed_description:
The sequel to this game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1903310/


About the Game



I am the strongest swordsman in the world...
If you stand in front of me, you'll lose your life....

About game


A first-person sword action game.
The game is completed when the condition is achieved and you reached the destination.

There are 3 levels in total.
Level 1: Beat two enemy bosses and reach the goal.
Level 2: Find Lilia somewhere, rescue her and reach the goal.
Level 3: Maneuver a fighter plane and shoot down 30 enemy planes.

Controls


Walk: W, A, S, D
Run: Shift key
Jump: Spacebar
Draw the sword: E Key
Attack: Left-click
Pause menu: ESC key

Fighter plane
Fighter Movement: Mouse
Speed change: W, S
Horizontal translation: A, D
Attack: Left-click
Viewpoint Change: C

Game concept


The game capacity must be small and can be easily downloaded.
The game have to include the feeling of exhilaration.

If not translated: First press the language button.

data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core or AMD Quad-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT, Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 343 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core or AMD Quad-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 343 MB available space

There is an expression of bloodshed.
